title: Microwaves ovens U.S. unit shipments 2005 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Unit shipments in millions, containing a total of 15 data points.
In general Unit shipments in millions has stayed the same over the Year.

Unit shipments in millions is roughly constant from 2005 to 2006, gradually decreasing from 2006 to 2009, roughly constant from 2009 to 2012, gradually increasing from 2012 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Unit shipments in millions, about 13.86 was reported at Year 2005
The lowest Unit shipments in millions, of value 9.15 was reported at Year 2013
